snippet: Even before the midterm election results are tallied, American Bridge, the Democratic super PAC that supports Hillary Rodham Clinton, is tracking and researching 20 Republicans who could be potential presidential or vice presidential nominees in...
abstract: Even before the midterm election results are tallied, American Bridge, the Democratic super PAC that supports Hillary Rodham Clinton, is tracking and researching 20 Republicans who could be potential presidential or vice presidential nominees in 2016.

headline.main: A 2016 Preamble: Opposition Research for Hillary Clinton
